document_data.name: A House of Joy
document_data.mainbody:
'''A House of Joy''' was the shrine built to [[Lliira]] in the small town of [[Asbravn]]. Both the town and shrine were situated within an isolated area of the [[Sunset Vale]], where the [[Dusk Road]] met the [[Uldoon Trail]].

It was one of several smaller shrines, including those to [[Morningstone House|Lathander]] and [[Goldcoin House|Waukeen]], built around the rundown yet still-running [[House of the Suffering God]], dedicated to [[Ilmater]].
